vlive.korean: [이왕 하는 거] - 아버지 사업체도 홍보해. - 그래. [Then...] - Promote your father's business. - Yes. 듣기 View video Big Picture : 빅픽처 ep36_낚시인가! 진짜인가! 워너원 섭외?!

examples.korean: a business beset by price wars and market saturation 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가격 전쟁과 시장 포화 상태에 시달리는 사업(체) Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a business beset by price wars and market saturation Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The business has 34 retail outlets in this state alone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사업체는 이 주에만도 34개의 직판점을 두고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The business has 34 retail outlets in this state alone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Few businesses are flourishing in the present economic climate. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 현 경제 상황에서는 번창하는 사업체가 별로 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Few businesses are flourishing in the present economic climate. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He built up his multimillion-pound music business from small beginnings. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 작게 출발하여 수백만 파운드짜리 음악 관련 사업체를 세웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He built up his multimillion-pound music business from small beginnings. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They admired the smoothness and efficiency with which the business was run. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 사업체가 매끄럽고 효율적으로 운영되는 것에 감탄했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They admired the smoothness and efficiency with which the business was run. Add to Wordbook
